00018 #ifndef _CVDENSE_IMPL_H
00019 #define _CVDENSE_IMPL_H
00020 
00021 #ifdef __cplusplus  /* wrapper to enable C++ usage */
00022 extern "C" {
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 #include <cvode/cvode_dense.h>
00026 
00027 /*
00028  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00029  * Types : CVDenseMemRec, CVDenseMem                             
00030  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00031  * The type CVDenseMem is pointer to a CVDenseMemRec.
00032  * This structure contains CVDense solver-specific data. 
00033  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00034  */
00035 
00036 typedef struct {
00037 
00038   long int d_n;        /* problem dimension                       */
00039 
00040   CVDenseJacFn d_jac;  /* jac = Jacobian routine to be called     */
00041 
00042   DenseMat d_M;        /* M = I - gamma J, gamma = h / l1         */
00043   
00044   long int *d_pivots;  /* pivots = pivot array for PM = LU        */
00045   
00046   DenseMat d_savedJ;   /* savedJ = old Jacobian                   */
00047   
00048   long int  d_nstlj;   /* nstlj = nst at last Jacobian eval.      */
00049   
00050   long int d_nje;      /* nje = no. of calls to jac               */
00051 
00052   long int d_nfeD;     /* nfeD = no. of calls to f due to
00053                           difference quotient approximation of J  */
00054   
00055   void *d_J_data;      /* J_data is passed to jac                 */
00056 
00057   int d_last_flag;     /* last error return flag                  */
00058   
00059 } CVDenseMemRec, *CVDenseMem;
00060 
00061 /* Error Messages */
00062 
00063 #define MSGDS_CVMEM_NULL "Integrator memory is NULL."
00064 #define MSGDS_BAD_NVECTOR "A required vector operation is not implemented."
00065 #define MSGDS_MEM_FAIL "A memory request failed."
00066 #define MSGDS_LMEM_NULL "CVDENSE memory is NULL."
00067 #define MSGDS_JACFUNC_FAILED "The Jacobian routine failed in an unrecoverable manner."
00068 
00069 
00070 #ifdef __cplusplus
00071 }
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #endif
